channel.title: Keylogged!
channel.description:
Yesterday when I was on YouTube, I was looking at Art Money programs, and a guy posted a link where to download Art Money. So I went there and downloaded, after that, I opened it, and it didn't work. So then I was like "Wtf? It doesn't work? I wonder if it's a keylogger!"
So then I went to scan the file online, and it came up with a keylogger and viruses! I deleted the file, then I scanned my computer with Spybot - Search & Destroy.
The keylogger showed up on the screen after the scan was completed, the name was "Elite Keylogger". Then I removed it. After that, I downloaded Ad-Aware and scanned my computer again. You know what happend? It came up with "Elite Keylogger" again! I also removed it. After I scanned my computer with Spybot and Ad-Aware, I decided to run a Disk Cleanup and Disk Defragmenter, I also ran CCleaner.
Well, the problem is, I'm not really sure if I got rid of that keylogger 100%. I'm still pretty sure I still have it...
I've also been using On-Screen Keyboard lately to login into RuneScape, so I havn't been hacked yet. (Hopefully...)
If you have any suggestions of giving me some more information on removing the keylogger if I still have it, please reply back.
[size=14pt][u][color=red][b]WARNING[/b][/color][/u]: Do not download the file in the link below! It contains [color=blue]VIRUSES[/color] and [color=blue]KEYLOGGERS[/color]! Which can harm your computer! I am not forcing you to download! Download at your own risk![/size]
The link where I downloaded the fake ArtMoney program is [url=http://sendspace.com﻿/file/5dxqda]here[/url].
Thanks, Yoshi0308

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Baros Rocks:

Onscreen keyboard sends the same type of signals as a normal keyboard

yeah it pisses me off when i read the tech support bit in runescape and someone has posted:
“halp i got keylogged”

and all the other noobs are going:
“dont worry just use on screen keyboard, im totally leet for telling you this because i need to be a mod”

item.title: Keylogged!
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:6, topic:136332”][quote author=Yoshi0308 link=topic=187831.msg1696641#msg1696641 date=1187936735]
I hope I got rid of the keylogger. Man… when I scanned the program… it came up with whole bunch of viruses and keylogger. Fuck that retard that posted the keylogger.

[/quote]

Thats odd…

My keylogger picks up all the shit I type, even with the onscreen keyboard.

What AV are you using?[/quote]

lol the onscreen keyboard you click on so it doesnt record key strokes -.- it would have to like video your screen…

Read full topic

item.title: Keylogged!
item.dc:creator: @Yoshi0308 Yoshi0308
item.description:
@Yoshi0308 wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:3, topic:136332”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=187831.msg1696253#msg1696253 date=1187930230]
is artmoney rs realted?
[/quote]

Artmoney is a crappy version of CheatEngine that they want people to pay for.

and

Okay, so earlier today about 25mins ago I went to download a ArtMoney program. When it finished downloading, I opened it, and when I did, a pop up came saying something like “Invalid” blah blah, and then the artmoney program closed. So then I was like “Wtf? It don’t work? I wonder if it’s a keylogger!”

Then I went to scan it, and it came up with viruses and a keylogger. I deleted the file, then I went to scan my computer with Spybot - Search & Destroy.

I’ve deleted the keylogger now. But I’m still not sure if I got rid of it.

Please tell me if you think I got rid of it, if not, please give me some suggestions of using other programs to scan my comp.

Right now I’m using On-Screen Keyboard to log onto my rs account.

The only thing I did was delete the file, scan my comp, and delete the keylogger. I’m not sure if that worked much, so please give me some more suggestions!

Thanks,
Yoshi0308

You didn’t think of, maybe, scanning it before you ran it?[/quote]

It wasn’t even a real ArtMoney program. It was a scam.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2007, 07:21:21 PM[/size][hr][quote=“billygotshot, post:4, topic:136332”]well this is the easy way to find out if your still key logged… get a bank pin then log in normally and bank all your stuff before you log out… make sure you can recover it to and if the pass is changed or you notice a different ip when you log in you still have a keylogger. most likely i doubt you do if you deleted the keylogger.[/quote]

I’m not really sure if I deleted it. I’ve been using On-Screen Keyboard lately to login. Havn’t noticed any other IP’s, my character is still where he is in when I last logged out. Still got stuff in bank. (I got a bank pin.)

I hope I got rid of the keylogger. Man… when I scanned the program… it came up with whole bunch of viruses and keylogger. Fuck that retard that posted the keylogger.

Read full topic

item.title: Keylogged!
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

well this is the easy way to find out if your still key logged… get a bank pin then log in normally and bank all your stuff before you log out… make sure you can recover it to and if the pass is changed or you notice a different ip when you log in you still have a keylogger. most likely i doubt you do if you deleted the keylogger.

Read full topic

Right now I’m using On-Screen Keyboard to log onto my rs account.

The only thing I did was delete the file, scan my comp, and delete the keylogger. I’m not sure if that worked much, so please give me some more suggestions!
